paper_abstract: In this paper, we are concerned with a 2m-point boundary value problem with one-dimensional p-Laplacian. By using a fixed point theorem in a cone, the existence of at p-Leastone, two or three positive solutions under some sufficient conditions is obtained. The interesting points are that the boundary condition is a new kind of Sturm-Liouville type and the nonlinearity may change sign. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence results of 2m-point boundary value problem of Sturm-Liouville type with sign changing nonlinearity
